summary: THE FRONT SUN VISORS WILL NO LONGER HOLD THEMSELVES UP.  IF LEFT ALONE, THEY WOULD HANG DOWN IN THE DRIVER'S FIELD OF VISION.  THEY ARE CURRENTLY BEING HELD UP WITH VELCRO.  THEY HAVE BEEN THIS WAY FOR SOME TIME, BUT THE CAR IS OUT OF WARRANTY.    THIS IS A WELL DOCUMENTED FAILURE AND SHOULD BE FIXED ON ALL MODELS AFFECTED.
